scripts.generate-schemas: npm run generate-action-sheet-schema && npm run generate-dialog-schemas && npm run generate-firebase-push-notification-schemas
scripts.generate-dialog-schemas: npm run generate-alert-schema && npm run generate-prompt-schema && npm run generate-confirm-schema
scripts.build-core: (cross-env npm_config_yes=true NEXT_PUBLIC_ENGINES=1 NEXT_PUBLIC_HIDEPATH=1 MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_PATH=localhost:3006/gql NEXT_PUBLIC_GQL_SSL=0 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 DEEPLINKS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006 npm run build-electron)
scripts.build-windows: (cross-env MIGRATIONS_DIR=.migrate && npm run build-core) && npm run build-pack
scripts.build-unix: (cross-env MIGRATIONS_DIR=/tmp/.migrate && npm run build-core) && npm run build-pack
scripts.build-mac: APPLEIDPASS=$(security find-generic-password -w -a menzorg@gmail.com) APPLEID=menzorg@gmail.com CSC_NAME='ABRAKAR, OOO (8ZG6TUT4AY)' npm run build-unix
scripts.build-browser-extension-linux: npm run build && npm run export && mv ./out/_next ./out/next && cd ./out && grep -rl '/_next' * | xargs sed -i 's|/_next|/next|g' && cd ../ && rsync -va --delete-after out/next/ extension/next/ && cp out/*.html extension && rm -rf out
scripts.build-browser-extension-mac: npm run build && npm run export && cp -rf out/_next out/next && sed -i '' -e 's~_next~next~g' out/**.html && mv out/**.html extension && rsync -va --delete-after out/next/ extension/next/ && rm -rf out && rm -rf extension.pem && /Applications/Google\ Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google\ Chrome --pack-extension=./extension
scripts.build-android: rm -rf app && rm -rf out && npm run build && npm run export && npx cap sync android
scripts.build-electron: npm run build && npm run export && npx rimraf electron/app && npx cap copy electron
scripts.dev-electron: npm run build && npm run export && npx rimraf electron/app && npx cap copy electron && npx cap open electron
scripts.add-android: npm run build && npm run export && rm -rf ./android && npx cap add android
scripts.install-next-electron: npm ci && cd electron && npm ci && cd ..
scripts.build-ios: rm -rf app && rm -rf out && npm run build && npm run export && npx cap sync ios
